rows.label: bf06090100_0010
rows.name: I've noticed something about Metsu.

rows.label: bf06090100_0020
rows.name:
Not once has he used his power
as the Holy Grail so far.

rows.label: bf06090100_0030
rows.name: I think this is a proof of malfunction.

rows.label: bf06090100_0040
rows.name:
You mean he can't use the full extent
of his powers?

rows.label: bf06090100_0050
rows.name:
The wounds I dealt in our battle long ago
may not be completely healed.

rows.label: bf06090100_0060
rows.name: His goal is Eden.

rows.label: bf06090100_0070
rows.name:
He wants to go back to the place he was born.
There he can heal until his powers have recovered.

rows.label: bf06090100_0080
rows.name: If Metsu is allowed to restore himself...

rows.label: bf06090100_0090
rows.name: The tragedy from 500 years ago, will repeat.

rows.label: bf06090100_0100
rows.name: Or worse still. Metsu is genuine.

rows.label: bf06090100_0110
rows.name: He means to destroy humanity in its entirety.

rows.label: bf06090100_0120
rows.name: Why would anyone desire that?

rows.label: bf06090100_0130
rows.name: Perhaps he does not even have a reason.

rows.label: bf06090100_0140
rows.name:
It seems to be a deep-seated drive.
An instinct. As natural as breathing.

rows.label: bf06090100_0150
rows.name: All of this is my responsibility.

rows.label: bf06090100_0160
rows.name:
Your Holiness?
Whatever do you mean?

rows.label: bf06090100_0170
rows.name:
It was none other than I who awakened Metsu
and unleashed him upon the world.

rows.label: bf06090100_0180
rows.name:
So, Your Holiness...
the rumor that you were once Metsu's Driver is...

rows.label: bf06090100_0190
rows.name:
I never intended to obscure the truth.
It is writ plain for all to see in history books.

rows.label: bf06090100_0200
rows.name: I was a fool...

rows.label: bf06090100_0210
rows.name: It was to prevent such foolishness...

rows.label: bf06090100_0220
rows.name:
that all passage to the World Tree
was forbidden after the Holy Grail War.

rows.label: bf06090100_0230
rows.name:
However, it has become apparent that the
laws of men do not apply to Metsu...

rows.label: bf06090100_0240
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*gasp*

rows.label: bf06090100_0250
rows.name:
The time may have come...
to lift that restriction...
